title: Drawing, "Armchair, Upholstered", ca. 1930s
medium:
Graphite, orange color pencil; ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
markings: Stamps: Large stamp in black ink at upper center: [torn]/145[torn]/New York City
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower center to lower right: NOTE. UPHOLSTERY WORKIN GENERAL LOOKS TO(sic.) CARELESSLY DONE/MUST BE WELL TAILORED AND FINELY FINISHED./WELT EDGES ARE TO(sic.) HEAVY. Inscribed dimensions, instructions Inscribed in red color pencil at lower center: P
